name: The Escapist (itch) (Fengyu Xu)
description:
The Escapist

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Escapist is a thrilling 3D, third-person RPG with a captivating story set in a Cthulhu-themed world. Players can explore various endings by solving puzzles in different ways. Be cautious when deciding who to ally with, as everyone harbors their own secrets.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Playtest Questionnaire: https://forms.gle/z3QsW3G7M5qDivvt5
